QueryResult.text: with fields as( select lookup_enum item_id, name name, lookup_code item_code from cmn_lookups_v where lookup_type = 'BLB_SLICE_ITEM' and language_code = 'en' and is_active = 1 ), logs as ( select b.job_run_id, b.phase, b.field field_num, f.name field_name, b.operation, nvl( b.step_order, 0 ) step, nvl( b.batch_num,0) batch_num, b.request_name, b.num_objects, (( b.finish_date - b.start_date )*86400.0) SECONDS, b.start_date, b.finish_date, b.created_date from temp_ts_logs b, fields f where b.field = f.item_id ) select "JOB_RUN_ID","PHASE","FIELD_NUM","FIELD_NAME","OPERATION","STEP","BATCH_NUM","REQUEST_NAME","NUM_OBJECTS","SECONDS","START_DATE","FINISH_DATE","CREATED_DATE" from logs
